schemas.name: ENA-GSC_MIxS_air
schemas.title: GSC MIxS air
schemas.description: Genomic Standards Consortium package extension for reporting of measurements and observations obtained from the environment where the sample was obtained. By choosing the environmental package, a selection of fields can be made from a relevant subsets of the GSC terms.
